prompt_base: raw photo, cinematic film still, portrait of an (intense Asian fusion warrior:1.2), hyper-muscular athletic physique, spiky black hair, serious determined gaze, 8k uhd
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, (subtle sweat and skin imperfections:1.2), individual spiky hair strands, source palette preservation, identical color matching, (matching heavy fabric weave on vest:1.2), (matching padded texture:1.2), film grain, sharp focus
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, (3d render:1.3), (cgi:1.3), (toy:1.4), (plastic:1.3), (doll:1.3), mannequin, airbrushed, smooth skin, low quality, feminine, (helmet hair:1.2), too soft
